DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the relative bioequivalence of Bupropion HCI 300 mg ER Tablets under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: To Demonstrate the Relative Bioavailability of Bupropion HCI 300 mg Extended-Release Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B orc. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
